sentences.sentence: This opera is one of the cultural totems of Western civilization.
sentences.translation: 这部歌剧是西方文明的文化标志之一。

sentences.sentence: “All these tokens and totems, it’s part of what we do, ” Ms. Burlingame said.
sentences.translation: “这些徽章信物，已是我们的一部分，”伯林盖姆女士说。

sentences.sentence: totems to the radiant future that was always promised, but never quite arrived.
sentences.translation: 许诺给人民一个光辉的未来，但从来就不会兑现。
